title: West Side Story (Promo-The Mail) [EAC - FLAC] (oan)
description:
Leonard Bernstein - West Side Story(Promo-The Mail)[EAC - FLAC](oan)




It is the musical that changed musicals forever... featuring hit song after hit
song, winning an incredible ten Oscars and becoming one of the worldÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s
most popular shows.

It is the fantastic West Side Story - and today's The Mail on Sunday is giving
every reader a FREE CD featuring all the original unforgettable songs from
the award-laden film version of the legendary show.

It is bursting with 15 classic songs from this electrifying masterpiece of
musical theatre, including Maria, Tonight, I Feel Pretty, America, and
Somewhere. YouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll soon be singing along to this great collection again and
again!




Based on ShakespeareÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Romeo and Juliet, West Side Story thrillingly
chronicles the unlikely romance between a white New York street hoodlum
and his Puerto Rican lover, set against a backdrop of violence and racism
doled out by two city gangs, the Jets and the Sharks.

The movie made international celebrities of its stars Natalie Wood, Rita
Moreno, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn and George Chakiris. Yet the real
stars were these songs, by Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim.




The music is soaring and emotional, mixing jazz and Latin-American
rhythms in a sophisticated blend of complicated musical styles. The lyrics
are complex, witty and soul-stirring.
